replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
1.5 倍速MOD? 不清楚哪個... 
怎麼不用單人指令啊??
setspeed [SPEED|reset] - Sets the speed that the player moves
fly [SPEED] - Allows you to turn flying mode on/off, speed specified your flying speed


[V1.7.3] CJB Mods v4.4.0
How to install:
- INSTALL MODLOADER AND ANY OTHER MOD FIRST, EXCEPT FOR MCPATCHER HD FIX!!!! 
- Place the content of "Put in Minecraft Folder" folder inside ../appdata/roaming/.minecraft/ folder
- Place the content of "Put in 32x32 Texture Pack" inside your 32x32 Texture Pack zip file.
- Place the content of "Put in minecraft.jar" folder inside ../appdata/roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraft.jar
  install cv.class if you want to use X-Ray (INSTALL MODLOADER FIRST)
  install gs.class if you want to use fly in SMP
  install yq.class if you want to use no fire spread cheat
  install cy.class if you want to use mob spawner mod

又要翻譯嗎?? 唉... 
1 - 先裝 Modloader 及其他要用的MOD, 尤其是高清補丁 MCPatcher 
2 - "Put in Minecraft Folder" 文件夾裡的東西放到 .minecraft 裡
3 - "Put in 32x32 Texture Pack" 文件夾裡的東西放進你的 32X材質包 .ZIP 文件中
 4 - "Put in minecraft.jar" 文件夾裡的東西放到 minecraft.jar
要用X光透視, 就放 cv.class (要先裝 Modloader)
要用聯機飛行, 就放 gs.class  
要用無火災蔓延, 就放 yq.class  
要用怪物生成mod, 就放 cy.class

replies.author: 幸福君
replies.txt_content: 简单英语应该是要懂的哦。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-4104-1-1.html 单击命令可以飞行 可以秒方块 也不需要啥爬墙了
